Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Cloud

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Cloud
public class Cloud extends Object
The class cloud represent the cloud in the game, the cloud store the student until they are choosen at the end of the turn, a cloud can be full or not, depending if it was already choose in the turn, the most important methods in the class cloud are refill cloud to refill the students in the cloud and choosecloud to permit the player to choose the cloud

  • Constructor Details

    • Cloud

      public Cloud(int maxStudents)
      Creator of the entity Cloud
      Parameters:
      maxStudents - is the maximum number of students the cloud can contain. It depends from the number of players in the match

  • Method Details

    • refillCloud

      public void refillCloud(ArrayList<Student> newStudents)
      Method to refill cloud with 3 or 4 Students, according to the number of players
      Parameters:
      newStudents - ArrayList containing the new students to be added

    • getNumberOfStudentPerColor

      public int getNumberOfStudentPerColor(Color color)
      Method to return how many students of a Color are available on this Cloud
      Parameters:
      color - is the color of the students you are interested in
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of students of that color on this Cloud

    • getStudents

      public ArrayList<Student> getStudents()
      Returns a copy of the students on the Cloud (to let the users to examine the cloud)
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the copy of all these students

    • chooseCloud

      public ArrayList<Student> chooseCloud()
      Returns the students on the cloud and empties the cloud
      Returns:
      these students

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      To check if a cloud is full (and therefore to check if a cloud has been already selected from another player)
      Returns:
      true if the cloud has still students on it, false elsewhere

    • setIsFull

      public void setIsFull(Boolean isFull)
      To set the value of the attribute isFull
      Parameters:
      isFull - is a boolean value to be assigned to the private attribute isFull
